#  Integrate Systems Without Code

Use ZigiOps – the most flexible no-code integration platform.  

Free 30-Day Trial

Unlimited Syncs

##  What we do

ZigiOps connects Monitoring, IT Service Management, DevOps, and CRM tools
without any code.  
We automate your IT Operations for faster issue resolutions!  

### ITSM

Integrate some of the most popular ITSM tools with your DevOps and Monitoring
ones. Automate incidents, events, and change requests transfers in a few
clicks. Sync all related fields.  
  

### Monitoring

Get a full overview of your IT infrastructure and application performance.
Connect your Monitoring, IT Service Management, and DevOps tools. Transfer
events, CIs, topology, and more.  
  

### DevOps

Automate workflows and streamline your DevOps pipeline. Integrate your DevOps
tools with the IT Service Management and Monitoring ones. Sync tickets,
events, change requests and more.  
  

### CRM

Connect your CRM platforms with ITSM and DevOps ones and automate the data
transfer between them. Do it without any code or script.  
  

Explore Integrations

##  Integrate. Simplify. Automate

ZigiOps is the most flexible no-code integration platform which creates
powerful integrations within minutes.  
Set up, modify and launch your integrations in minutes. Enable the seamless
data exchange between your systems.

##  Why ZigiOps?​

##### No-Code Integrations

Integrate your systems without any code or scripts.

##### Flexibility & Scalability

Syncronize all entities and fields. Scale and modify.

##### Integration Templates

For the most common use cases. Fully customizable.

##### Real-Time Data Exchange

Automatic transfer of data bi-directionally.

Explore Product

With ZigiWave’s integration solution we not only managed to automate some of
our critical processes but significantly decreased man time to resolve
incidents. Our teams are now working in full synchronization and we are very
happy with our partnership with ZigiWave

ZigiOps is a powerful and easy-to-use integration platform. It helped us
connect Jira and ServiceNow effortlessly, and now we can sync tasks and
incidents between the two Platforms in real time. This speeds up incident
resolution, ticket management, and helps us be more efficient by reducing
administrative tasks. Also, ZigiOps’ team is fantastic! They’re a pleasure to
work with, responded quickly to feature requests and have always provided
excellent support.

It is important for us to be able to handle all customer requests in a timely
and efficient manner. ZigiOps helped us improve the communication between our
teams and expedites issue resolutions. This leads to happier clients and
better business outcomes.

We were looking at a lot of integration providers and after careful research,
we decided to go with ZigiOps since it provides a simple, yet powerful
solution which perfectly addressed our needs. With ZigiOps we are able to
achieve the Single pane of glass monitoring solution. ZigiOps provides a
comprehensive overview of our monitoring performance through one centralized
system. Our issue resolution time and overall efficiency have greatly
increased after the introduction of ZigiOps.”

##  Easy as 1-2-3

Get your integrations ready in a few clicks. Start automating in minutes !  

Install ZigiOps

Run a straight forward installation on premise or just login to the cloud
version. No matter which one you choose, you can get started in minutes.

Connect your Systems

Select the systems you want to integrate and enter your credentials to connect
them. All set. ZigiOps automatically loads the schema for you and makes
integration configuration super easy.

Choose a template

Choose one of our predefined templates which are based on the most common
integration scenarios. Load it and go.

Configure specifics

Easily modify all you need in the integration. Change data mappings and
filtering in minutes. Scale and update anytime.

Save and test

Save your integration and you are ready to test how it works. Make some
changes in your systems and see how they are transferred instantly. That’s it!
Easy as 1-2-3.

###  See ZigiOps in Action

**Codeless integrations** – Integrate your systems in a few clicks without any
code.  
  
**Unlimited scalability** – create new integrations in minutes and change the
existing ones in a breeze.  
  
**Unlimited syncs and users** – no limit on the number of transactions.  
  
**Integration templates** – load and use instantly.  
  
**Flawless user experience** – install, modify, and set up your integrations
within a few clicks.  
  
**Guided UI** – the integration wizard guides you through the integration
setup.  

**Advanced data mappings** – the integration wizard guides you through the
integration setup.  
  
**Stable single source** – standalone integration platform that connects to
systems via APIs – you do not need to change anything within your system
instances.  
  
**Maximum security** – not storing any of the transferred data.  
  
**ISO 27001 certified** – following the highest security standards and best
practices.  
  
**High availability** – you are backed up if one of your systems goes down,
99.9% uptime for 365 days of the year guaranteed.  
  
**Premium support** – support is included with all integrations.

ZigiOps is the most flexible, no-code integration platform. Born from the need
to help you automate processes and enhance cross-team collaboration, ZigiOps
seamlessly connects your systems, while extracting and transferring data
between them in real-time. Our recovery features protect you from losing
valuable data in case of system downtime.

#### Privacy Overview

This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate
through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as

basic functionalities of the website. We also use third-party cookies that
help us analyze and understand how you use this website. These cookies will be
stored in your browser only with your consent. You also have the option to
opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may affect
your browsing experience.
